distinct
from gun_location
order by ${orderByClause}

id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
app_id = #{record.appId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gun_id = #{record.gunId,jdbcType=CHAR},
gun_mac = #{record.gunMac,jdbcType=CHAR},

longitude = #{record.longitude,jdbcType=CHAR},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
version = #{record.version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
area_code = #{record.areaCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
speed = #{record.speed,jdbcType=CHAR},
director = #{record.director,jdbcType=CHAR},
gun_device_battery_power = #{record.gunDeviceBatteryPower,jdbcType=CHAR},
gun_device_state = #{record.gunDeviceState,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update gun_location set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, app_id = #{record.appId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gun_id = #{record.gunId,jdbcType=CHAR}, gun_mac = #{record.gunMac,jdbcType=CHAR}, latitude = #{record.latitude,jdbcType=CHAR}, longitude = #{record.longitude,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, version = #{record.version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, area_code = #{record.areaCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, speed = #{record.speed,jdbcType=CHAR}, director = #{record.director,jdbcType=CHAR}, gun_device_battery_power = #{record.gunDeviceBatteryPower,jdbcType=CHAR}, gun_device_state = #{record.gunDeviceState,jdbcType=INTEGER}

app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gun_id = #{gunId,jdbcType=CHAR},

latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=CHAR},
longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=CHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update gun_location set app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gun_id = #{gunId,jdbcType=CHAR}, gun_mac = #{gunMac,jdbcType=CHAR}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=CHAR}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, area_code = #{areaCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, speed = #{speed,jdbcType=CHAR}, director = #{director,jdbcType=CHAR}, gun_device_battery_power = #{gunDeviceBatteryPower,jdbcType=CHAR}, gun_device_state = #{gunDeviceState,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT gl.gun_id as gunId,g.gun_model as gunModel,g.gun_type as gunType,gl.gun_mac as gunMac, gl.latitude as latitude,gl.longitude as longitude,gl.gun_device_battery_power as gunDeviceBatteryPower,gl.gun_device_state as gunDeviceState,gbc.bullet_number as bulletNumber, g.total_bullet_number as totalBulletNumber,g.warehouse_name as warehouseName,a.app_imei as appIMEI, a.app_phone as appPhone,adda.app_battery_power as appBatteryPower FROM ( SELECT * FROM gun_location t WHERE (create_time =(SELECT MAX(create_time) FROM gun_location WHERE gun_mac = t.gun_mac) ) AND t.gun_device_state=0 GROUP BY gun_mac ) AS gl LEFT JOIN gun AS g ON gl.gun_mac=g.gun_mac LEFT JOIN gun_bullet_count AS gbc ON g.gun_id=g.gun_id LEFT JOIN app AS a ON gl.app_id=a.id LEFT JOIN app_dynamic_data AS adda ON a.id=adda.app_id
gl.gun_mac = #{gunId}

SELECT gl.*, ROUND(6378.138*2*ASIN(SQRT(POW(SIN((#{lat}*PI()/180-gl.latitude *PI()/180)/2),2)+COS(#{lat}*PI()/180) *COS(gl.latitude *PI()/180)*POW(SIN((#{lng}*PI()/180-gl.longitude *PI()/180)/2),2)))*1000)AS juli FROM gun_location AS gl WHERE gl.gun_device_state=0 GROUP BY gl.app_id HAVING juli > 100 ORDER BY juli DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT app_id,gun_id,gun_mac ,latitude ,longitude ,create_time from gun_location
gun_id = #{gunId} and gun_device_state=0 and create_time BETWEEN SUBDATE(now(),interval 20 minute) and now() ORDER BY create_time ASC
